title: Ten Shades of Submission
description: Men and women whose yearnings can only be satisfied by a dominant woman fill the pages of this new collection of femdom fiction. Jim Lyon is on his way to becoming a major writer of erotica, and this compilation of very hot shorts shows why, Among the stories showcased are: A NIGHT OF FIRSTSIN THE LIMELIGHTTHE RECREATION EXECUTIVE'S ASSISTANTOBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE BEHAVIORBAIT AND SWITCHA NICHE BUSINESSA GIFT FOR VERONICAPHONE SEX GONE WRONGTENNIS, ANYONE?A NIGHT AT CLUB NOIR
author: Jim   Lyon
